corpus.description: Wall Street Journal Texts from the PropBank Project
corpus.name: PropBank

sentence.text: In turn , members of the innovatory networks identified individual managers or particular functions whose overt opposition to , or lack of enthusiasm for the change strategy seriously hindered its progress .
